name: Margate
description: Licensed Margate electricians providing professional residential and commercial electrical services. Solomon Electric is your local choice for safe, reliable power solutions throughout the City of Margate.

challenges.title: Mature Residential Safety
challenges.description: Margate's established neighborhoods require expert electrical auditing to ensure older wiring and panels can safely support modern appliance and technology loads.

challenges.title: Commercial Code Compliance
challenges.description: Margate's business corridors along State Road 7 require electricians who can deliver fast, compliant service for retail and commercial properties.

challenges.title: Storm Ready Protection
challenges.description: To protect against South Florida's frequent summer lightning, we specialize in high-performance whole-home surge protection for all Margate residences.

faqs.question: Do you provide emergency electrical repairs in Margate neighborhoods like Coral Bay?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer full 24/7 emergency response throughout all of Margate, ensuring your power is restored quickly and safely.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Margate?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We are fully licensed (FL License #EC13012419) and insured, with years of experience serving the Margate community.

seoContent.heading: Trusted Margate Electricians – Your Local Connection
seoContent.body: Margate is a community that lives by its motto 'Together We Make It Great.' It's a city of friendly neighbors and thriving local businesses. Solomon Electric is proud to be a part of that greatness, providing the professional electrical foundation that Margate homes and businesses need to flourish.

seoContent.heading: Reliable Electrical Solutions for Your Margate Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're in the beautiful Coral Bay area or a Business along State Road 7, our licensed team is ready to serve. We provide upfront pricing, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that has made us a leader in Broward County's electrical industry for over 15 years.
